pages.title: Advanced Spells
pages.text: A compendium of the spells that only the dark wands can cast. $(br2)(This wand can also perform the apprentice, intermediate and avanced spells except bubble related, defense and Cow Burst).

pages.title: Lava Bubble II
pages.text: Drags your target towards you more. Also, heals it more.

pages.title: Self Lava Bubble II
pages.text: Pressing $(k:turtlemancy.selfbubble) you can go (more) into the direction you are looking.

pages.title: Evil Defense II
pages.text: Use the wand while sneaking to get $(thing)Fire Resistance III$() at the cost of getting $(thing)Slowness I$().

pages.title: Turtle Burst
pages.text: Use the wand against a $(turtle) to make it explode. Yeah. You hate Turtles. Why? I don't know. Maybe becouse you are fast, light, coward, smooth, cozy, big, racist, and you make awful sounds with your nearly 360 degree vision. $(br2)Explode turtles and get a lot of scute.
